entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late in the evening then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
